front.title: IEEE Standard Measurement Procedure for Field Disturbance Sensors 300 MHz to 40 GHz
front.abstract: " Test procedures for microwave field disturbance sensors to measure radio frequency(RF) radiated field strength of the fundamental frequency, harmonic frequencies, near field powerflux density, and nonharmonic spurious emissions of sensors operating within the frequency rangeof 300 MHz to 40 GHz are defined. "
